composition_types.name: Poke Composition
composition_types.description: Focuses on dealing damage from a distance to siege towers or whittle down enemies before objectives, avoiding direct all-in fights.
strengths: Good at controlling zones around objectives.
Can win fights before they start by lowering enemy health.
Relatively safe laning phase for key carries.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to hard engage and dive compositions.
Can struggle if enemies can heal or shield through poke.
Requires good positioning and disengage tools.
May lack sustained damage in extended fights.
strategic_focus: Siege towers slowly using poke advantage.
Avoid all-in fights unless enemies are low.

composition_types.name: Dive Composition
composition_types.description: Focuses on quickly closing the distance to eliminate high-priority backline targets (like ADCs or Mages).
strengths: Can force fights on their terms.
Effective against immobile poke or scaling compositions.
weaknesses: Requires coordination to execute dives successfully.
Can be kited or peeled if engage fails.
Vulnerable during cooldown windows after engage.
May struggle against heavy CC or disengage.
strategic_focus: Secure vision deep in enemy territory to find picks.

composition_types.name: Protect the Carry Composition
composition_types.description: Revolves around enabling and protecting a hyper-carry champion (usually ADC) to deal massive damage in late-game teamfights.
strengths: Hyper-carry can often 1v9 if sufficiently protected.
weaknesses: Weak early game, vulnerable to pressure.
Reliant on the hyper-carry staying alive and positioning well.
Can be countered by strong pick or dive compositions that can eliminate the carry early.
May lack proactivity on the map early.
strategic_focus: Survive the early game, funnel resources to the carry.
Maintain excellent vision control around the carry.
Peel attackers off the carry in teamfights.
